message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your product's value and understand your perspective. However, my budget allows me to pay no more than $80 for this product. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your honesty. I would like to make a counteroffer at $85 for the product. This is my final offer before considering other potential buyers. I hope we can reach a satisfactory agreement.
